sentence: Very Dissapointing Performance.

sentence: Don't make the same mistake that I did and please don't buy this phone.

sentence: This phone might well be the worst I've ever had in any brand.

sentence: Case was more or less an extra that I originally put on but later discarded because it scratched my ear.

The explanation highlights the negative sentiment and provides a clear reason for the rating.

sentence: I recommend iGo to anyone with different brand cell phones/mp3 players in the family.

sentence: Don't bother - go to the store.

sentence: I posted more detailed comments under the grey or black phone, but i have the Fire Red and it's a great color!

sentence: I did not have any problem with this item and would order it again if needed.

sentence: You get what you pay for I guess.

sentence: Not only did the software do a great job of this, I could also make my own ringtones form my existing CDs without an internet connection.

sentence: im surprised this is a good quality car charger and there's not much reviews about it.

sentence: These are fabulous!

sentence: However, BT headsets are currently not good for real time games like first-person shooters since the audio delay messes me up.

sentence: I used bitpim (a free program you can find on the internet)to transfer data to the phone.The price of the cable was excellent.

sentence: Disappointing accessory from a good manufacturer.

sentence: Performed awful -- muffled, tinny incoming sound and severe echo for those on the other end of the call.

sentence: Very wind-resistant.

sentence: Obviously they have a terrible customer service, so you get what you pay for.

sentence: They do not last forever, but is not overly expensive to replace.Easy to operate and the sound is much better than others I have tried.

sentence: I contacted the company and they told me that, although the unit was still under warranty, if I couldn't produce my receipt I was out of luck.

sentence: Linksys should have some way to exchange a bad phone for a refurb unit or something!

sentence: Great phone.
